name: Police Car Chase Prado - Prisoner Escape Plan 2017
name_original: Police Car Chase Prado - Prisoner Escape Plan 2017
description:
You are WANTED can you survive escaping police cars with 4x4 luxury prado? Escape cops car by dodging & taking wrong turns and avoid all obstacles as long as possible to avoid certain crash. Smash the chasing police cars on smashy road. Chasing police car is all about chase and run game. In the city of saints it's time to take vengeance from crooked cops on gritty roads. Be real criminal escaping away from police patrol squad in the latest car escape game

Burn your desire of racing in smash road by playing new police chase game of 2017. Run away while driving recklessly for survival in police vs thief game. Take control of powerful engine in underworld gangster driving game. Use nitro boost to speed up race and drive fast to get prison escaped from police car chase and ultimately become wanted mobster of sin city.
